name: FNF Mistful Crimson Morning Test
description:
It's Squidward from Week "Spongebob" Friday Night Funkin Mistful Crimson Morning! Play as Squidward and Doomsday Squidward! Credits do really go to DevilousHavoc for making the Friday Night Funkin' Mistful Crimson Morning! Play on the web here on a PC/Mobile devices! If you want, if you have a windows computer, you can also download it with the download button below!

Controls: 

To switch to touch control, touch the toggle in game.

Arrow keys to play the sounds (For mobile press D-pad button)

Hold space and press any other arrow key for secondary sound

Hope you enjoyed!  :)

Hold any of the buttons to hold a pose!

Check out the Friday Night Funkin here: https://ninja-muffin24.itch.io/funkin

Also check out Friday Night Funkin on Newgrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/770371

Check out the original Friday Night Funkin Mistful Crimson Morning mod: https://gamebanana.com/mods/387663
